project_descr: Sustainable Financing of Ecuador's National System of Protected Areas and associated private and community-managed Protected Areas subsystems

outputs.output_descr: The proposed project will strengthen the financial sustainability of Ecuador's National System of Protected Areas and associated sub-systems by increasing revenues, reducing costs, and improving financial planning and management at the level of the entire system and its constituent Protected Area Units. The overall project strategy and main components were identified in the preparation of the Project Identification Form and include systemic work as well as working with five protected areas within the existing sub-system of public Natural Areas of National Heritage, at two Private Forest sites and one community-managed conservation area.

project_title: sustainable financing of ecuador's national system
